name: portfilio_project
description: Simple single file REST-API using: - [ExpressJS](https://expressjs.com) For basic routing handler - [Sequelize](http://docs.sequelizejs.com) for Databases (MySQL) ORM - [body-parser](https://github.com/expressjs/body-parser) for HTTP POST method handler - [multer](https://github.com/expressjs/multer) for multipart-form and file upload handling - MySQL database --- ### Install Make sure you have installed [NodeJS](https://nodejs.org/) and MySQL server on your local machine.
